rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall with a reception area. It opens up to an open-plan living space and features an integrated wheelchair ramp.
Spacious open living room designed for natural light, ventilation, and energy efficiency. Large windows are placed to the north-east to align with Vastu principles.
Adjacent to the living room, offering ample space for dining and social gatherings. Features natural light through strategically placed windows.
Eco-friendly kitchen with energy-efficient appliances, ample ventilation, and natural lighting from south-west side to align with Vastu norms.
Full bathroom with accessible design features for wheelchair users. Includes grab bars and non-slip flooring.
A balcony attached to the living room, designed for relaxation and natural light exposure, with an accessible ramp integration.

openings.description: Main entrance door with a wheelchair-accessible threshold and energy-efficient glazing. Placed on the west side in accordance with Vastu recommendations.
Large, double-glazed windows for enhanced natural light and ventilation, strategically placed to avoid direct harsh sunlight per Vastu guidelines.
Energy-efficient window with adequate ventilation, ensuring a bright and airy kitchen environment while maintaining privacy.

rooms.description: A spacious master bedroom with a balcony offering natural light and fresh air. Features an en-suite bathroom, walk-in closet, and wheelchair-accessible design elements.
Balcony adjacent to the master bedroom providing outdoor space with natural lighting and ventilation. Designed for ease of access via a ramped approach if needed.
A comfortable second bedroom featuring built-in storage, ample natural light from windows on the south side, and an accessible balcony for fresh air.
Balcony attached to the second bedroom ensuring additional outdoor space and alignment with Vastu principles for personal growth.
A dedicated home office located on the first floor, designed with energy-efficient lighting, natural ventilation, and ergonomic furniture to accommodate wheelchair users.
Second bathroom accessible from the second bedroom, incorporating accessibility features such as grab bars and a level floor design.

openings.description: An elegantly designed staircase with wheelchair-accessible ramp integration, providing a smooth transition between floors. Includes handrails and non-slip surfaces.
Balcony door with energy-efficient glazing to ensure privacy while allowing natural light and ventilation.

rooms.description: A roof deck area hosting a swimming pool. The pool is designed with eco-friendly materials, water recycling systems and ample space for relaxation while ensuring safety for wheelchair users.

openings.description: A secure ladder access to the roof deck, designed with non-slip surfaces and accessibility in mind.
Large windows for natural ventilation around the pool area while ensuring privacy and energy efficiency.

vastu_considerations: North-east direction for living room windows to enhance positive energy
South-west placement of kitchen to maintain balance and harmony
Balconies positioned to facilitate natural light without direct harsh sunlight exposure
